title: Nescafe Dolce Gusto Cappuccino Coffee Pods - 16 Capsules
description:
Treat yourself to the perfect balance of rich espresso and creamy milk foam with Nescafe Dolce Gusto Cappuccino Coffee Pods, delivering a truly indulgent coffee experience right at home.

  • Taste Profile: Indulge in the harmonious blend of bold espresso and velvety milk foam in Nescafe Dolce Gusto Cappuccino, with rich coffee notes complemented by creamy sweetness, creating a luxurious and satisfying coffee moment.

  • Compatibility: Designed for seamless integration with your Dolce Gusto machine.

  • No. Of Servings/Pods: Each box contains 16 capsules.

  • Weight (Per capsule): Approximately 14 grams.

  • Recommended Shot: Embrace the creamy goodness with a classic cappuccino shot, brewed at 120ml.

  • Roast: Medium-dark.

  • Intensity: 5.

  • Composition: Crafted from premium Arabica and Robusta beans.

Ingredients:

Coffee Capsule: Roast & Ground Coffee.

Milk Capsule: Whole Milk Powder, Sugar (17%), Emulsifier (Soya Lecithin).

  • Nutrition Facts (per serving):

    • Calories: 70
    • Fat: 3g
    • Carbohydrates: 8g
    • Protein: 3g

title: Nescafe Dolce Gusto Cappuccino Skinny Coffee Pods 16 Capsules
description:
• Indulge in the creamy goodness of cappuccino while watching your calories with Nescafe Dolce Gusto Cappuccino Skinny Coffee Pods, offering a lighter yet equally satisfying coffee experience.

  • Taste Profile: Delight in the rich and creamy flavor of cappuccino, now with fewer calories, in Nescafe Dolce Gusto Cappuccino Skinny. Enjoy the same velvety milk foam and bold espresso, perfectly balanced for a guilt-free indulgence.

  • Compatibility: Crafted for seamless integration with your Dolce Gusto machine.

  • No. Of Servings/Pods: Each box contains 16 capsules.

  • Weight (Per capsule): Approximately 14 grams.

  • Recommended Shot: Enjoy the creamy indulgence with a classic cappuccino shot, brewed at 120ml.

  • Roast: Medium-dark.

  • Intensity: 5.

  • Composition: Crafted from premium Arabica and Robusta beans.

  • Ingredients: 100% Arabica and Robusta coffee beans, skimmed milk foam powder.

  • Nutrition Facts (per serving):

    • Calories: 50
    • Fat: 2g
    • Carbohydrates: 6g
    • Protein: 3g

title: Nespresso - Arpeggio (BB:31/08/2024)
description:
Dive into the deep and intense flavors of Nespresso Arpeggio!

  • Taste Profile: Rich and creamy with strong cocoa notes and a hint of roasted intensity.
  • Compatibility: Compatible with Nespresso Original Line machines.
  • No. Of Servings/Pods: 10 capsules per box
  • Weight (Per capsule): 5g
  • Recommended Shot: Espresso (40ml)
  • Roast: Dark
  • Intensity: 9
  • Composition: 100% Arabica
  • Ingredients: Ground Arabica coffee
  • Nutrition Facts: 0 calories, 0g fat, 0g carbs, 0g protein per serving

title: Costa Nespresso Compatible - Lively Blend - 10 Caspules
description:
Discover the ideal harmony between boldness and sweetness. This powerful blend will fulfill your desire for an authentic Italian espresso. 

Taste Profile: Enhance your coffee experience with our Costa Lively Blend which contains a delightful blend of grains. Enjoy the subtle notes of almonds by adding a touch of sugar or milk.

Compatibility:  Nespresso machines.

No. Of Servings/Pods: Each pack contains 10 capsules.

Recommended Shot: Ristretto (25 ml)

Weight: 57g 

Roast: Dark

Intensity: 11

Composition: Arabica and Robusta

Ingredients: 100% roasted & ground coffee

Taste Profile: Experience a rich, caramelly aroma in this coffee with both espresso and milky beverages. For black coffee, it also boasts hints of honey and orange.

title: Lavazza - Whole Beans - Tierra Brasile - 1 Kg
description:
Discover the exceptional quality and sustainable flavor of Lavazza Tierra Brasile Whole Bean Coffee - a carefully crafted blend focusing on both taste and eco-friendliness.

Taste Profile: Lavazza Tierra Brasile is a blend of premium Arabica and Robusta coffees with an original taste

weight: Each package contains 1 kilogram of premium whole bean coffee.

 Roast: Medium roasted

Intensity: 8

Composition :  70% Arabica and 30% Robusta

• Aromatic Notes: Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts and Cane Sugar.
